entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Garden Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
